title: Face Pack - Lavender & Sandal
description: The Face Pack is enriched with Sandal and Lavender extract. Sandalwood has antiseptic properties that prevent pimples, acne and sores from development. The antifungal properties of Lavender sooth your skin and help to reduce inflammation.
advantages: (-) Useful for all types of skin
(-) Sandalwood has antiseptic properties that prevent pimples, acne and sores from development
(-) The antifungal properties of Lavender sooth your skin and help to reduce inflammation
(-) Very effective for skin protection and Nourishment
how-to-use: Wash your face with luke warm water.  Splash your face with cold water and gently pat it dry with a soft towel.
Apply an even layer of face pack on your face and neck.
Be sure to leave half inch margin around your eyes as this area is very sensitive.
Leave it on for 10 to 15 minutes, then rinse of with water. Be sure to remove with circular motion to exfoliate.
Use two to three times a week for the best result.
